text:
Hi Devs, I ran in a very weird issue. I have the domain connected to the HubSpot protal, and all the pages are listed there. Now I tried to create a blog, and the primary domain is not showing as an option.
Any guidance is appreciated!

Found it! Under Domains & URLs I had to connect the domain to blog content types!

Thanks for reading, enjoy your Sunday :beers:
What API would I use to determine the user who the current token is authed as?  Also, what endpoint do I use to list users with access to the account?
